prompt: Nikhil was a young boy who loved to play and explore. One sunny afternoon, he decided to venture out into his backyard, which he imagined as a vast space filled with stars and planets.

As Nikhil played in his imaginary space, he stumbled upon a mysterious object that had crash-landed in his backyard. Curious, he approached it cautiously and discovered it was a small spaceship with blinking lights and strange symbols.

Excited by his discovery, Nikhil climbed into the spaceship and pressed a button that activated the engines. To his amazement, the spaceship lifted off the ground and soared into the sky, taking him on a thrilling adventure among the stars.
